comment: /**  * Sets the tragic exception or if the tragic exception is already set adds passed exception as suppressed exception  * @param ex tragic exception to set  */
code: /**  * Sets the tragic exception or if the tragic exception is already set adds passed exception as suppressed exception  * @param ex tragic exception to set  */ public void setTragicException(Exception ex) {     assert ex != null.     if (tragedy.compareAndSet(null, ex) == false) {         if (tragedy.get() != ex) {             // to ensure there is no self-suppression             tragedy.get().addSuppressed(ex).         }     } }
